biotools.summary: CometAnalyser is an open-source deep-learning tool designed for the analysis of both fluorescent and silver-stained wide-field microscopy images. Once the comets are segmented and classified, several intensity/morphological features are automatically exported as a spreadsheet file.

bioschemas.name: CometAnalyser
